text:
e="preserve">Adamu Daramani Sakande (6 May 1962 – 22 September 2020) was a Ghanaian politician. He was a member of the Fifth Parliament of the Fourth Republic for the Bawku Central Constituency between 2009 to 2013. He was a member of the New Patriotic Party.
Sakande died of a long-illness at a London hospital on 22 September 2020, aged 58.
